Text:
Hello BmanT, this torrent was for the purpose of getting people playing the Multiplayer/Online part of the game, for the single player i would refer you to my other torrent of this game found here
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5028169/Quake_3_Arena_-_CD_Rip

where you will be able to mount the full CD of the game in order to play the Single Player.

works perfectly. even on windows 7. hit sounds dont play, and sounds cut themselves off in the menu, but other than that it works fine. can't play this online, however, thanks alot for the download! :D
